ai-atk-s0401a19:1_0: They don’t enjoy vanquishes, and enjoy extinguishment.
ai-atk-s0401a19:1_1: He isn’t looking forward to enjoying the body of the deathless, how does he eat it?
ai-atk-s0401a19:1_2: then he gave him all that works.
ai-atk-s0401a19:1_3: Because of this mindfulness of the body, he doesn’t achieve the deathless.
ai-atk-s0401a19:1_5: The meaning is this meaning should be understood here in all the way.
ai-atk-s0401a19:1_6: And even if he should strive, here gain the unattached,
ai-atk-s0401a19:1_9: Where they stand and sit or lie down on the ground.
ai-atk-s0401a19:1_13: they haven’t known, yet given up by relatives,
ai-atk-s0401a19:1_14: Without understanding the infatuated relatives they completely understanding the enlightenment factor,
ai-atk-s0401a19:3_0: On the Wanderering With the Kattikā Suttanta
ai-atk-s0401a19:4_0: The commentary on the one side is finished.
